title: Fine if you are willing to put time in to problem solve
text: I use it for most of my mail stuff but am heavily considering not using it anymore. It is relatively easy to use, but this app is FULL of problems. One of the problems is the fact that the app randomly signs you out of your accounts, and now that this is the third time it has happened, it says that my phone number cannot be used for recovery because it has been used too many times. I absolutely hate it when apps (mainly google) blame and punish you for things that you didn‚Äôt do.
